definition: money is omnipotent (idiom)/with money, you can do anything/money talks
gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
coin/money/CL:筆|笔[bi3]/unit of weight, one tenth of a tael 兩|两[liang3]
can/to be able to/might possibly/ability/(physics) energy

sentences.english: When moneys speaks the truth is silent.
sentences.chinese: 當金錢萬能時，真理無言。

sentences.english: I am wiser than to believe what you call money talks.
sentences.chinese: 我不至於可笑到相信你所謂的金錢萬能的說法。
你怎樣能證明“金錢萬能”？

sentences.english: I don't believe your theory of"money tells".
sentences.chinese: 我不信你說的什麼金錢萬能的道理。

sentences.english: Money talks way too loud in our country.
sentences.chinese: 在我國，金錢萬能太佔上風了。

sentences.english: Do you believe money is everything?
That money talks, I'll not deny.
sentences.chinese: 金錢萬能，這點我不想否認。
